scripts.start:dev: concurrently --names 'DB,WEB-CLIENT,SERVER' 'cd db && yarn && yarn start:dev' 'cd web-client && yarn && yarn start:dev' 'cd server && yarn && yarn start:dev'
scripts.teardown:dev: concurrently --names 'DB,WEB-CLIENT,SERVER' 'cd db && yarn teardown:dev' 'cd server && yarn teardown:dev'
scripts.build: cd db && yarn docker:build && cd ../web-client && yarn docker:build && cd ../server && yarn docker:build
